        public static void formatGraph(GraphWrapper graph)
        Removes all punctuation from the GMLids of graph nodes

      • formatEdgeSummary

        public static void formatEdgeSummary(EdgeSummary edgeSum)
        Removes all punctuation as well as top-level domain names from an edge's source and target GMLid
        Parameters:
        edgeSum - whose GMLid is to be rid of punctuation and TLD name

      • formatNodeSummary

        public static void formatNodeSummary(NodeSummary nodeSum)
        Removes all punctuation as well as top-level domain names from node GMLids. Also populates the 'className' and 'packageName' of the NodeSummary.
        Parameters:
        nodeSum - whose GMLid is to be cleaned and whose class and package names are to be populated.

      • removeOnlyGMLIDBadChars

        public static void removeOnlyGMLIDBadChars(NodeSummary nodeSum)
        Removes all punctuation of a NodeSummary's GMLid except for periods.
        Parameters:
        nodeSum - whose GMLid is to be rid of punctuation
